name: Sunday Self-Driver
description:
You thought Sunday Drivers were bad, well get ready for a self-driving one....

Sunday Self-Driver is a singleplayer top-down-shooter/driving game about a self-driving car rampaging out of control! Set up a custom control scheme and get to terrorizing the local military. Whenever you take a hit, you lose the keyboard keys you were using, forcing you to pick new ones. Keep going until you run out of keys! 

This game was created in 48 hours for the 2020 GMTK jam.

Credits:

Programming and Design - Massimo Gauthier

Sound, Music, Art, and Design - Jeremy Dumont
